summary: CLONE Dugout Mena V2 - videos not clickable in carousels

Steps to reproduce:

go to altv.com/dugout
Click on a video in a carousel

Expected result:
Video is clickable and loads and plays on page

Actual result:
Video is not clickable, does not load or play
